title: Hopkins 130 12th Ave. S. C2 1/2 off Aug. rent.
posting_body: ['1 bedroom 2nd level apartment available now in downtown Hopkins.', 'Rent is $895.00 / month with heat, water, sewer, and trash paid.', 'Approx.725 square feet, carpeted, new large kitchen with lots of cupboards, big closets, storage locker, laundry on-site, AC, 1 parking spot.', "This building is in a very convenient location for both driving, busing, and walking - easy freeway access to anywhere and a block walking distance to playgrounds, Main Street's restaurants, theater, art center, and more.", '130 12th Ave.', 'So.', 'No smoking.', "Deposit is typically equal to one-month's rent.", '$20 application fee per adult.', 'Qualifying household income is 3X the monthly rent.', 'Good rental references (no late payments, no lease violations, no damages or cleaning issues, you do not owe previous landlords money, etc.), no recent or violent criminal history.', 'When you email for an appointment please include some times that work for you to see the apartment.', 'Thanks!']
